passages.text: Queen's Bexce Drviston. (Before Lord Coleridge and Mr. Justice Mathew.  In this case a rule had beeri granted for a certiorari to remove an indictment for libel preferred against George Francis Legg, s solicitor, on the prosecution of Harold Alexander, an of ecer in her Majesty's army, from the Central Criminal Court to this Court, in order that it might be tried before a special jury. The circumstances were as follow : Both the defendant and prosecutor are members of the Cocoa Tree Club,
At the Hull Police-court, on Thursday, a young girl named Isabella Hewson was charged with the murder of her illegitimate child
